events.title: Mehendi Ceremony
events.description: Join us for an evening of henna art, music, and celebration as we prepare for the big day.

events.title: Wedding Ceremony
events.description: The moment we've been waiting for - our wedding ceremony where we'll say "I do" in front of our loved ones.

events.title: Reception
events.description: Dance the night away with us as we celebrate our new beginning with dinner, drinks, and dancing.
